ctx: destruct x as [[[a b] c] d].
exceptions.tactic: unfold Rplus, Rmult, Rzero, Rone in *.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce Rplus to an evaluable reference.

original: intros x. destruct x as [[[a b] c] d]. unfold ID_22. unfold M22 in *. unfold Rplus, Rmult, Rzero, Rone in *. simpl. repeat match goal with | |- context[Rplus Rzero ?x] => rewrite (Radd_0_l _ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp R_is_ring x) | |- context[Rplus ?x Rzero] => rewrite (ARadd_0_r _ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp R_is_ring x) end. repeat match goal with | |- context[Rmult Rone ?x] => rewrite (Rmul_1_l _ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp R_is_ring x) | |- context[Rmult ?x Rone] => rewrite (Rmul_comm _ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp R_is_ring x Rone); rewrite (Rmul_1_l _ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp R_is_ring x) | |- context[Rmult Rzero ?x] => rewrite (Rmul_0_l _ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp R_is_ring x) | |- context[Rmult ?x Rzero] => rewrite (ARmul_0_r _ Rzero Rone Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp R_is_ring x) end. auto.
